sourcesContent: import { Component, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; import { Project } from '../project'; import { PROJECTS } from '../projects'; @Component({ selector: 'app-portfolio', templateUrl: './portfolio.component.html', styleUrls: ['./portfolio.component.css'] }) export class PortfolioComponent { static readonly projects: Project[] = PROJECTS; filters: Array = ["Windows","MacOS","Android","iOS","Web Browser","Python", "C#","Java","JavaScript","TypeScript","SQL","HTML/CSS","Angular","Bootstrap","Design","Unity","2D","3D"]; filtered_item: string = ""; filtered_projects: Project[] = PortfolioComponent.projects; project_skills: string[] = [""]; project_platforms: string[] = [""]; project_languages: string[] = [""]; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { } @HostListener('document:click', ['$event']) documentClick(event: MouseEvent) { // this.projects.pop(); } filter($event: string) { if($event == ""){ return; } this.filtered_item = $event; //event emitted by filters component this.getFiltersFromProjects(); // console.log(this.filtered_item); // this.remove_project(this.filtered_item); } checkUndefined(item: any) { if (item === undefined) { throw new Error(item + " is undefined!"); } return item; } getFiltersFromProjects() { for (let i = 0; i < PortfolioComponent.projects.length; i++) { if (this.filtered_projects[i]["skills"].size != 0) { this.project_skills = this.project_skills.concat(this.checkUndefined(this.filtered_projects[i]["skills"].get("skills"))); this.project_platforms = this.project_platforms.concat(this.checkUndefined(this.filtered_projects[i]["skills"].get("platforms"))); this.project_languages = this.project_languages.concat(this.checkUndefined(this.filtered_projects[i]["skills"].get("languages"))); } } console.log(this.project_platforms); console.log(this.project_languages); console.log(this.project_skills); } remove_project(item: string) { for (let i = 0; i < PortfolioComponent.projects.length; i++) { let project_skills: Map = this.filtered_projects[i]["skills"]; console.log(project_skills); } } }
